title: Account Hacked
body: Hey riot, I have not played on my main account in about a full month because I haven't been able to log into the account. I have filled out a ticket about it earlier this month but nothing was done. I have this smurf account that I have had to be playing on but my main account is Revaltions. I looked up the account and it has been being played on almost daily. They have renamed my mastery and rune pages and also don't even use the champions I main. I have spent well over a couple hundred on this account so it sucks that it was hacked. Please anything you can do to get my account back will be much appreciated.

replies.body: How can you be so sure who is the owner? Is there any way to verify if the hacker is the owner? cause for all i know, the hacker is playing and nobody asks him for account owner validation uh. That is pretty much giving the hackers a free account ? If someone claims his account has been hacked, and  the hacker claims its his, Do a validation test, see who has the most good results, and you have your truthful owner. Easy, simple, efficient.

I don't see any recent tickets or submissions that went unresolved.  Due to the sensitive nature of account information, the boards would not be the best place to discuss this.  Your best bet would be to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and seek assistance from our account recovery team.  

In a cases where an account is not recovered, keep in mind that we won't restore access unless we're absolutely certain it's going back to the owner.  You can also use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to prepare for the recovery process.  Best of luck!
